channel.title: HELP (missing "Include SRL.scar" ++ if yuo help me with this
channel.description:
RIGHT WHEN I TRY TO RUN "m0u53m4ts Ultra Bone Man V7.1" i get the following error
[code] Include file D:\Program Files\SCAR 3.02\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling [/code]
what am i doing rong how i fix? were i ger this file how i complie just tell me to sdfu and then give me what i need new to this scar script so i would have a clue..

item.title: HELP (missing "Include SRL.scar" ++ if yuo help me with this
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

you can either do the in-scar download of SRL, or manually download it from srl-forums.com

If I’m right, this error just means that you do not have SRL into that folder. If its somewhere else, either move it there, or change its location in the script.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP (missing "Include SRL.scar" ++ if yuo help me with this
